title: AN AFK BAN WHEN I WENT 2/7/18 ON THRESH WHAT?  But I was there the whole game

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I got a random 5 game 20 min afk ban for a game that I was present for, the game glitched out in the beginning, for some reason I couldn't see the map and everything was in fog of war, including myself, towers, and my teammates, chat still worked though, any way I had to leave but I immediately reconnected. It still gave me a ban. Why was I given ban timer for reconnecting?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: You mentioned at the end there that you needed to leave, but did reconnect before the end of the match. I know it feelsbadman, but it really sounds like you might have been gone long enough to get marked as AFK which regardless of winning or losing, will still get you the AFK penalties.
I was only gone for 2 mins however, it was at the very start of the game.

You're always welcome to reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for those types of discussions, we can't take action on punishments here from the boards. 

Also, keep in mind the system won't apply 20 min LPQ's on the first AFK. Usually, you get away without any penalties until the system notices a trend of leaves, at which point you only get 5 min LPQ's. You only get 20 min LPQ's when the system notices a history of that behavior.
Well i've had plenty of occasions where my computer craps out or my patch messed up DX feels bad
I was only gone for 2 mins however, it was at the very start of the game. Is there anyway to get an afk ban removed, because I do not want to waste 100 mins for no reason.
My friends power went out and he came back at like 15 min and the game was like 45 min long but anyways we still won and he got a 20 min queue.
I can kinda understand why he got the ban, but, he came back, it's not like afk trolls come back to the game so.... rito pls?
